content:
| Asset | Sullivan Had | Required to Win |
|-------|--------------|-----------------|
| Personal favorability | High | Not enough alone |
| Constituent service | Legendary | Didn't override party |
| Rural relationships | Extensive | Collapsed anyway |
| Native support | 90%+ | Turnout fell short |
| Crossover potential | Some | Not in Trump year |
| Time in office | 18 years | Became liability |

---
section: Comparison: What Sullivan Had vs. What He Needed
